message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $100! It's one of the best in its class, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with its performance. Would you like to take it off my hands?
I'll take it, thank you!

You're really getting a great deal! This high-quality product is a real showstopper, and I'm sure you'll love it just as much as the last one. Would you like to make it a pair and take this one home too?
I'm good for now, thanks. I'll stick with the one I already have.

No worries, I understand. But let me ask you, are you sure you won't regret passing up this opportunity? This high-quality product is a rare find, and I'm not sure when I'll have another one like it. Would you like to reconsider?
I'm good, thanks. I'm not looking to buy another one right now.

Okay, I understand. But I have to say, I'm a bit surprised you're passing up another high-quality product. I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased from me, and I'm confident you'll love this one too. Would you like to take a chance and try it out?
I appreciate your confidence in your products, but I'm just not interested in buying another one right now.

I respect your decision, but I want to make you a special offer. Since you've already purchased one high-quality product from me, I'm willing to throw in a special bonus with this one. Would you like to take a look at the details and consider making it a part of your collection?
Thanks for the offer, but I'm still not interested in buying another product.

Thanks for the offer, but I'm not interested in buying another product.

This high-quality product is a rare find, and I'm not sure when I'll have another one like it. Would you like to reconsider and take a closer look?
